divs: Sighting Detailsfirst sight was a blue line in the sky.it was very fast at third site beacause it would hide then come back.in the shape was in a triangle shape but without one side and on missing side there was one blue orb.when it would fly to the left it would be in the blue shape i justy menssioned,then when it went right it was the same color on it and had two red orbs on each side.far off the side it turned red and went right and wouldnt do anything.but when it came left it would be doing tricks and circleing around one star in the sky.this ufo was not related in being an unidentified flying object not alien realated.it was an ufo a;ien realated and this was not a plane.it would go realy fast to the right when it was hedding to the right with the to red orbs one under it and one above it.i named it the blue flyer beacause it was blue and flying,somtimes it would com in from the left not the right.this is the first ufo ive every seen in my life.
Summary: Fast moving bright blue lit triangluar flying object.
